Text: Thank you. I was about to dig out an old VHS of this, but this seems like a better option.

@rambam1776: Thanks for the upload. Greatest war film ever made - far surpassing Bruckheimer's Pearl Harbor - which was rubbish.

Tora Tora Tora is great due to its story-telling plus the casting of non-box office actors to ensure that the audience's attention is on the the film rather than the actors...
